basics.name: Eilam Shapira
basics.label: PhD Candidate at the Technion, IIT
basics.summary: My research focuses on training large language model-based agents for non-cooperative games. It aims to develop agents capable of effective natural language communication in economic settings, under a variety of types of data availability, while using reinforcement learning and transfer learning techniques.

education.summary: Thesis: Generalization Methods for Training Large Language Model-Based Agents in Non-Cooperative Games. Advisors: Prof. Roi Reichart, Prof. Moshe Tenennholtz
